abstract: Mixed reaction to the news that Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani died in a targeted strike by the United States at Baghdad International Airport.
lead_paragraph: The killing of a top commander of Iranâ€™s Revolutionary Guard in a targeted strike by the United States set off a cascade of criticism, tough talk and jitters, extending from the halls of Congress and Twitter to the Middle East and the oil futures market.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
